You can't believe Lisa would do something so drastic. Everybody knows how chubby she is, but she's not a chronic overeater or anything. She's isn't athletic at all, and over the years you've gone to school with her fat has been accumulating all long her body. To you it seems natural. You look down at her nicely-tanned thighs, bulging out slightly from under her shorts onto the hot leather sofa. SLAM!

There is a new game show called "The Biggest Gainer". The show is comprised of five teams of two people. Each team has both a man and a woman. Every day the teams compete in certain challenges that have to do with fat or being fat. The winners of these challenges will receive special prizes (like big meals or gain shakes/pills). At the end of each month there is a weigh-in and the team who has gained the least weight has to leave the show.

The heaviest team at the end of the show gets their own private mansion, complete with wait staff, as well as two million dollars cash.

You (the reader) can now choose on whether you want to be a contestant, or an observer, of "The Biggest Gainer"!

Ashley was new on campus, and right away she noticed something odd.

She knew that there was a well know sorority of fat women, but what she didn't know, was that on this campus, thin girls were ignored over the fat ones. This wasn't a problem for her, as she wasn't afraid to put on a few pounds, but it seemed that a few pounds wouldn't cut it. She would need to double her body weight in order to gain any respect in this place, and the thought of putting on that much weight was scary.

However, she sucked it up, and made her way to the clearing in the woods outside the University, where the pledges where to be made in only half an hour. She knew that she could back out at anytime, join a different sorority or even leave to a different collage, but she knew that wasn't entirely true. This sorority ran much of the collage, so a second sorority was unlikely, and this was the best school for The Arts in the country.

She soon found her feet no longer tread on a paved footpath, and were now walking over loose gravel. The wind rustled the leaves on the trees, knocking a few down, indicating the change of seasons. One such leave landed on Ashley's nose, but she paid no mind, as she was already scared beyond belief.

She also knew that some girls were turned away, as they didn't have the stomach capacity to gain enough weight in only two months. They were free to try again, in a years time. The red head was not going to wait that long, so for the last month she had been training, drinking bottle after bottle of soda, and holding the gas in for hours at a time, and for the last week, she hadn't eaten anything. This morning she drank a full gallon of water, stretching her shrinking stomach once more. The girl was definitely ready.

She looked at the pie, pondering its fate. Her train of thought ended upon giving an impulsive shrug.

"Meh, why not?" She grabbed a fork from a nearby drawer and sliced it into the unusually soft pie, lifting off a bite-size piece and exposing the near-black interior. Upon bringing it into her mouth, she gagged and instantly turned green. After much retching, she finally managed to swallow.

...as it was for the next piece.

...and the next one.

...and the next one.

One nauseating hour later, she'd finally managed to slay the entire pie slice.

"Ugh...*hic*...I'll never...*hic*....do something like that a-*urp*-again..." Yet despite the pain she put herself through, she was still ready to pursue her meal.

However, before she could reach another morsel, a rather loud churning sound emanated from within her stomach. It left an unusual, unsettling feeling within her.

"Oh no...maybe eating that pie wasn't such a good idea..."

The sound increased in volume substantially, now generating vibrations that could be felt as she pressed her hands against her abdomen. However, her fear turned to confusion as she felt her stomach push her hands away...

"WHAT THE..." She called out as she felt her stomach gain fat instantly. All she could do was watch in amazement as she spontaneously began to inflate with fat.

Getting up with a new level of difficulty, she could feel her now-enormous stomach sag from out of her shirt and her pants tighten as her legs expanded.

"WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?!!?" She screamed in horror, panicked over her condition. She reached for a telephone to call for help but then...

...she was overcome by this warm, comforting feeling that seemed to have been generated by her expanding figure. Surprised, yet somewhat welcoming toward the feeling, her fears began to disintegrate and were replaced with sheer euphoria.

"This is...amazing..." She put her hands around her stomach, now big to the point where her fingers were just barely touching. As she inflated, she also noticed that not only her girth had increased, but she was also growing taller. At that point, she was well over six feet.

She immediately fell backwards in delight, relishing in the ecstatic emotions running through her as she continued to grow. Fatter and taller she kept growing, never showing any signs of stopping.

It continued for about ten minutes before her growth stopped, but she was still in a daze for a few minutes longer before she realized the effect of the pie must have stopped. Despite her now unfathomable mass, her muscles must've expanded as well, enabling her to stand.

She was now exactly nine feet tall, her forehead pressing against the ceiling. Her eight foot wide ass was more than large enough to fill an entire couch, sticking out about four feet from her back when seated on the ground. Now sticking a little over seven feet from her spine, her belly was a few inches from touching the ground, now practically a sphere that her foot-wide breasts rested flat atop. Each of her arms lengthened to four feet each and grown to a foot-and-a-half in width. Both legs were four feet tall, four feet wide at the thigh, vaguely tapering to three feet at the calf and bunching into her feet.

The least affected part of her body were her feet, hands, and head, yet all were fattened generously. Her head sported two more chins, the middle one over six inches long.

She stood there for several minutes, examining her body. Despite her size, her clothes seemed to grow slightly as well, possibly due to an effect from her sweat. Despite their new size, however, they were stretched tight to a point where they looked like stretched rubber.

"Woah..." She tried to wrap her enormous arms around her titanic stomach, but there was too much fat for them to reach. Instead, she opted to press her arms into her massive fat.

"This is SO COOL!" She laughed in amazement. Looking around the room, she saw the leather couch in the living room.

"Hmm..." She walked up to the couch and turned around to sit on it. The unfortunate sofa was nearly completely flattened as she sat on it, the sides splitting apart when they failed to contain her waistline.

"Heh...sweet." She chuckled.

Surprised by its size, Debbie decided to examine the book more closely, rather then blindly placing it back onto the shelf. She glanced at the cover and blew off a sheet of dust.

15223.content:
College was good for Robby. He'd done all the right things, got decent grades, an engineering degree and done sports too. Now he had graduated and with his degree had snagged a plum job with a big national firm. It meant relocating from backwoods Nebraska to big city Houston. Robby was fine with it. He was pulling in a good paycheck. Leased a nice downtown apartment and bought a Corvette. Life was good. Robby didn't know anyone in Houston but he wasn't worried. He'd always been good at making friends. Slowly he settled into the new routine, made friends at work and time passed.
"Hey, Rob." Robby had moved from being Robby to Rob - sometimes even Robert when he was presenting a project to a big client. Rob looked up to see Jeff grinning at him from across the room. Jeff and Rob had hired on together and for a time were working at the same level and on the same projects. Jeff had only advanced a bit on the pecking ladder while Rob was now a project leader poised for the next promotion. Jeff came over to Rob, hand outstreched.
"Congratulations on your promotion. You relly deseved it."
Rob took his hand and smiled. "Thanks Jeff. I had a lot of help from my team." Jeff had been a member of the team although Rob wasn't much impressed with Jeff's effort. The two men had been similar in creditionals at the start, even looked alike with the same lean muscular body shape. While Rob had progressed, he had kept his physique. Jeff, not so much. He'd married his college sweetheat and over the last year married life had interfered with his gym discipline. His wife was a great cook as well and Jeff was carrying 30 extra pounds over his college weight. "Here," he said handing Rob a box. "Mandy made you some cookies to celebrate."
Jeff was getting a double chin and a softly overhanding gut.
"Thanks." Rob said taking the box.. "You're a lucky man. Mandy's a peach."
"Lucky?" Jeff chuckled. "I'm lucky I don't weigh 300 pounds. Never thought I'd have a weight problem back in school. Now all I need to do is see food and I gain."
"Does Mandy think you are too big?"
"She keeps talking about a diet and then she cooks enough for a platoon and I can't stop eating."
"Well, you aren't some college jock any more. No need to look like it."
Rob left Jeff to mull that over and took the cookies over to the coffee room. No way he was going to eat them.
Rob's lifestlye was very disciplined. Fresh vegetables, lean meats, no fat no carbs. As he moved up the ladder he began to buy nicer suits, then had them custom made. He was proud of the way he looked in them. He even suspected that looking good might have more to do with his rise in the organization than his brains and hard work. There was only one chink in Rob's facade. It wasn't really a weakness just an area where Rob discipline wore thing from time to time. It was unexpected because Rob hadn't been raised in a family where food was important and yet, once Rob was introduced to fine cuisine it awakened an appetite that he never knew he had. It started when he started taking clients out to dinner in fine restaurants. At first he just paid no attention to the food but gradually he began to appreciate the finer points of fine dining and on rare ocasions he indulged. He began to look forward to those client dinners and scour the restaurant reviews for the best
15223.title: Robby, the single guy with a good paycheque?

152231.content:
Rob was on his way to becoming to bon vivant of the firm. Clents and potential clients were awed at his table-side manner (and the great food and wine they could expect. Rob had never been much of a foodie but over the three years at the firm, he had learned the nuances of French food, knew the staff at the best restaurants and blew the minds of clents/ Business was booming. It had started out simply enough as a marketing plan but Rob had discovered that he loved French food in all its forms and presentations. Entertaining those clents was Rob's forte and the enjoyment from the very good food was a bonus. Rob's healthy lifestyle with exercise and low fat and carb means was still his normal regimine but when he dined out with clients the whole program got blown to hell. His weight had crept up past 200 pounds and his tailor's skills disguised his thicker build. Jeff's continued growth gave Rob cover and so he had brought him into his team. Jeff was well over 250 and was way past pretending he was still a studly jock. Jeff's belly was big enough to sag over his belt. Jeff was comfortable with his size, and not embarrassed to eat his share of the office donuts. He'd complain from time to time but it was pretty clear that he was ok with the fatboy he had become.
"Mandy's pregnant again." Jeff told Rob. "Last kid, I gained 20 pounds because she was always cooking something she craved and then expecting me to eat it all. The first one upset me because I couldn't get over the idea that I was a hotbodied stud and didn't want to lose it."
Jeff grinned and patted his belly. "Too late for that now. I just go with the flow. If this one goes like the last, I'll be over 300 pounds - a real porker. You- on the other hand- still look like you did in college."
Rob nodded. He knew that it wasn't true but he wondered how much weight he had gained. At home he found his scale and weighed himself. He looked at the numbers...

info.brief_description: You are Rhonda, on a quest to be the biggest girl around! You add and I'll give points
info.description:
This is a WG/GTS story in which the main character(you) are a twenty something named Rhonda who is obsessed about gaining weight and getting big. You are the main character as you journey on several quests for size and mass. Feel free to introduce new characters (men can gain and grow too) and plot elements to the story as you see fit. You can also choose to change point of view if you so desire (as long as you say your doing so). I accept mostly any additions as long as they make sense and are readable. Other than that, have fun, and enjoy the reading! And I will give you points if you add!

Also, there are options to start your own story. So you can do that if you want to, just follow the appropriate chapter. They are on the first chapter... it says different idea completely.

Don't be afraid to shoot me a message if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions.

Hope you enjoy the show and maybe add a chapter or two. 1000 chapters is not too far away and I would just like to thank all involved so far!
